subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees are confident they will outbid the Astros for Andy Pettitte, especially after declining to offer a contract to Ted Lilly, who agreed to a four-year deal with the Chicago Cubs on Wednesday.
snippet: The Yankees are confident they will outbid the Astros for Andy Pettitte, especially after declining to offer a contract to Ted Lilly, who agreed to a four-year deal with the Chicago Cubs on Wednesday.
